text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my window
Puddle on the street
Dancing in the water
Moving to the beat

[Verse 2]
Clouds begin to scatter
Sun starts peeking through
Colors getting brighter
Sky returns to blue

[Chorus]
Shining through the rain
Feeling life again
Sunshine on my face
It's a brand new day

[Verse 3]
Splashing in the puddles
Laughing with my friends
Finding joy in chaos
Fun never ends

[Bridge]
Storms might come and go
But this I surely know
I'll keep shining bright
Through the darkest night

[Verse 4]
Every drop of water
Every ray of sun
Bringing us together
Hearts beat as one
title: Shining Through the Rain
